value:
Lord Pent cuts such a gallant
figure... It still feels like a dream to
have that man be my husband.

My only merit is my skill with the
bow. Yet...my bow is what gives me
the power to protect my Lord Pent.

To think I could slip so easily into
clothing so splendid... It feels as if
the entire world is sparkling bright.

I hope everyone can find themselves
a wonderful partner like Lord Pent
someday.

Lord Pent is quiet, thoughtful, and
he cannot ignore someone in need.
That is what drew me to him.

May the light bless you! I am Louise,
$Nf's envoy.

I vow all I am to protect
Lord Pent to the end.

I must always remember to
be thankful for my growth.

Oh? That's...a bit different
than what I expected.

Thank you. I am a fortunate
woman indeed.

I am Louise. I have given my heart to
my husband, Lord Pent, and pledged
my eternal love to him alone.

Thank you, $Nu.$k$pWords cannot express how grateful
I am that you prepared such a grand
venue for our celebration.$k$pI will remember the well-wishes
Lord Pent and I received from
everyone for the rest of my days.$k$pAnd to keep those memories and this
happiness alive, I will risk my life and
limb protecting them.$k$pWhatever it takes to create a peaceful
future for all those I hold dear!
それっ！
さあ
きゃああっ！
困りました…
True love lasts forever.
For my dearest!
Thank you so much!
What a happy occasion!
Pent... Forgive me...
giggle
I've truly been swept off my feet!
Hm? Is this your way of congratulating me? Thank you!
I know it's just for the festival, but dressing like this makes me feel like I'm walking in the clouds!
I told my sweet Lord Pent that, if he chose me, I would protect him to the end—and I will!
As long as I'm with my Lord Pent, the wheel of fate can carry us where it may.
Show the one you love your true heart...
This has all been wonderful, and it's all because of you. Thank you, truly.
Right you are.
I do.
The road to happiness.
